title: The Lincoln Highway
author: Amor Towles

quote_first: “I had been in the tech ninja sleeve only a few hours—
quote_last: according to the time display chipped into my upper-left field of vision—but there were none of the usual download side effects.”
title: Altered Carbon
author: Richard K. Morgan

quote_last: am., Mr Gasparian: I curse you. I curse your arms so they will wither and die and fall off your body…
title: Magic Bleeds
author: Ilona Andrews
